content: / 3 5oz mary maxim starlette worsted 13 100% ultra soft acrylic 180 yds/100g lion brand mandala ombre 14 100% acrylic 344yds/150g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet flo - front loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 15 gauge 15 sts x 9 row = 4 x4 in granny stitch with 5 0mm hook 22 sts x 22 row = 4 x4 in blo single_crochet with 4 0mm hook not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 16 sizes to fit head circumference newborn 13-14 33-36 cm baby 16-17 41-43 cm toddler 18-19 46-48 cm child/small adult 20-21 51-53 cm adult 22-23 56-58 cm large adult 24-25 61-64 cm skill level intermediate let s be
